text:
Bhimsingh Kannan (10 January 1951 – 13 June 2020) was an Indian cinematographer. He was born in Madras, Tamil Nadu. He was known for his works with director P. Bharathiraja. His best known works were "Oru Nadigai Natakam Parkiral" (1978), "Kadalora Kavithaigal" (1986) and "Solla Thudikuthu Manasu" (1988).
Kannan died on 13 June 2020 from problems caused by heart disease at a hospital in Chennai, Tamil Nadu, aged 69.
